title: Graphic problems
body: so recently my pc crashed and i re downloaded the game it's been fine but i noticed that the map was looking weird while i was waiting for the match to start last night. the best way to describe it was an old tv with bad reception that has stripes across the screen. anyways i went into the graphics settings and played with those, it doesn't always do it and anything else i run has no problems so i don't think my monitor or graphics card are messed up but maybe the video settings are changed from when i re installed the game. if anybody could help i would appreciate it and while your at it i got a HD i need to format to store data while my SSD runs the machine but thats for another time and place right now im focused on why my league looks different

replies.body:
That's really strange! This could be a driver/hardware issue, but I'd like you to try a [repair of the game files](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) real quick to ensure this isn't a file issue.

Let me know if this issue pops up again after a repair.

same issues but it seems to go away when i lower fps i just can't remember what i had my settings at before i reinstalled the game

Interesting. I suspect this could be an issue with your drivers or hardware then, so I suggest working through the [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) in its entirety. 

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

I tried to repair the game files but it was still the same problem, after going into the video settings i set my fps to a cap 144 and then selected the second bottom option that improves stability at the cost of performance and now it looks just fine but the fps doesn't go above 60 and the ping is at 43
